meta.Title: HINTS FROM THE HEADLINES [New York Times, Sunday, March 8, 1942]
meta.Author: Mabel Daggett

across.question: Pine tree of China and Japan.
Beloved by Glaucus in "Last Days of Pompeii."
They "fold their tents like the Arabs."

down.question: Dried leaves chewed by South American Indians.
